publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-142.1 Fergus Ewing: The Draft Budget (Scotland) Act 2003 Amendment Order 2003â€”As an amendment to motion (S2M-142) in the name of Mr Andy Kerr, insert at end "but, in so doing, regrets that the Scottish Executive has made the request for additional resources in a manner that does not provide the Parliament with the opportunity of having a separate and distinct vote on the proposed extra cash for the Holyrood building project."
